      Take Documents from distributed shared BlockingQueue Extract NamedEntitys from Documents Store them into index Tasks coordination with local or distributed shared in-memory BlockingQueues, - Extract all NamedEntitys from each Document using nlpPipelineTypes NlpPipelines - Index each NamedEntity to index using indexerType Indexer

      Extract Documents from files in inputDir, Put Documents on networked and shared BlockingQueue Store Documents into index Tasks coordination with local or distributed shared in-memory BlockingQueues, - Scan files from inputDir - Parse each file Path into a Document, poll from path queue and feed document queue - Index each Document to index using indexerType Indexer

      Extract Documents from files in inputDir, Extract NamedEntitys from Documents, Store them into index Tasks coordination with local or shared in-memory BlockingQueues, - Scan files from inputDir, put on path queue - Parse each Path into a Document, poll from path queue and put on document queue - Index each Document to index using indexer - Extract all NamedEntitys from each Document using nlpPipelineTypes NlpPipelines - Index each NamedEntity to index using indexer
